title: Energy Healing | Sumner | WA
description: Specializing in Chakras, Advanced Energetic Body Treatments, Awakening Spiritual Gifts, Color Light Therapy, Sound Therapy, Chinese Meridians, Bach Flower Remedies, Energetic Space Clearing, Shamanistic Healing, Young Living Essential Oils, Prana Healing.
cleaned_text: With Brynna Lyon: Certified Energy Therapist & Vibrational Medicine Teacher Welcome to our Tribe! We are committed to help you fully embrace all that you truly are so that you can expand your capacity to love yourself and others more completely. Our tribe consists of people from all walks of life and we are so blessed to be able to provide a safe space to learn, do deep self-healing, and to develop their amazing innate gifts so that they can heal and help raise the consciousness of those around them. We support individuals in understanding their life as a learning experience for their soul and guide them in making positive life changes while honoring and respecting each individual's unique life experiences and journey as an evolving spiritual being. Raise Your Consciousness The Chakra Rights To Know To See To Speak & Be Heard To Love & Be Loved To Act To Feel To Have
